resources.string:
Welcome to Palace! The object of the game is to get rid of all your cards. The first player to do so is the winner!!!
 
 Begin play by setting your Palace cards. These are the cards at the edge of the screen.
 
 	--Tap the CHANGE PALACE button. Your top Palace cards will appear in your hand. Select the three cards (by tapping) that you want in your top Palace.
 	--When you have your three cards selected, tap CONFIRM PALACE.
 
 With your Palace chosen, it is time to start playing cards, first from your hand. 
 
 	--Swipe up on the card that you wish to play.​
 	--If you want to play multiple cards (they must be of the same rank), then tap the cards you want. 
 	--They will get a yellow outline when selected. Swipe up on one of those selected cards or tap PLAY CARD to play them.​ 
 	--If you have no legal cards, then tap the discard pile to pick it up. 
 	--If your hand gets too big for the screen, then tap the LEFT and RIGHT buttons to scroll through your hand. 
 
 After you empty your hand, it is time to play from your top Palace. When that is empty, play from your bottom Palace.
 
 Rules of play 
 
 	--You can only make a move when the turn indicator (Pilots Anchor) is visible. 
 	--Cards can only be played if they are of higher rank than the card on top of the discard pile.
 	--Aces are high and there are a few special cards: 
 
 			--Twos can be played at any time and any card can be played on top of them. 
 			--Tens can also be played at any time and they will bomb the discard pile (remove all discard pile cards from play). 
 				--Note: the discard pile is also bombed when the top four cards are of the same rank. 
 			--Sevens obey normal rules, but only cards of lower rank can be played on top of them.
